songs.title: Akhiri Manzel (Final Destination)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Sadi akhiri manzel..
Sadi akhiri manzel..
This one's dedicated to my Boy B - Brown Messi (huh)
Man how you doin' out there ?
Sadi akhiri manzel..

[Hook]
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Sanu maut ni maar paye jandi hai ta jaan jaye
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Hai rab de asool hun sochna fazool
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel

[Verse 1]
Naal challo piche mere 200 saal
Punjab di zameen - hariyali, singaar, zindagi haseen
3 waqta di roti haveli bhavein choti
Loki praonde khushiyan de moti
Fir majbaan de piche ladd matt kho bethe
Changi bhali si zameen tod do kar bethe
Kehnde hindu muslmaan sada wakhra imaan
Bhul agye asi saare han insaan
Hun 2 mulk 2 badhshah 2 awaam 2 fauja
Haar ya jitt 2 anjaam 2 raste
Ladan is dharti de waaste
Ya chadda sab pardes de asre
Hun band saman mera, chad main jahan mera
Sochda ki hoyega nasal da anjaam mera
7 samandra paar, hath ch hathiyaar
Manni dil hai sadi akhiri manzel

[Hook (x2)]
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Sanu maut ni maar paye jandi hai ta jaan jaye
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Hai rab de asool hun sochna fazool
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel

[Verse 2]
Mooh ton dhua khich, pava main seene wich
Roka mai saah jado, charda nasha
Socha bola fir likha, dekha jeeva fer sikha
Meri jind javani de hai 3-4 din
Jeena ik ik din, din akhiri nu gin
Ghuma to chhupda firda khushia ch nahi
Azadi da din, mera bhang peeya bina lange ni din
Te meri raatan, vichde yara dian yaadan
Hun zindagi raah te, manzil maut val
Raah ch rukavata te mushkil ne boht
Jede lalchi chor oh meri toli to bahar
Mera peene te zor, bhang sir te savaar
Hun meri gal ik gaur naal sun
Tu ik mai tere kolo vad 100 gun
Mainu sun sharaba pee goliya chalaniya
Mera naa pehchande de shehar shehar de gunde

[Hook]
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Sanu maut ni maar paye jandi hai ta jaan jaye
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel
Desi putt jwaan ithe jind bitaun
2 din di, shera wangu hundi sadi zindagi
Hai rab de asool hun sochna fazool
Duniya da dil sadi akhiri manzel

[Outro]
Sadi akhiri manzel..
Sadi akhiri manzel..
Sadi akhiri manzel..
